page.title: 04Employment In Jedburgh
page.content: Apart from Mainetti and Starrett there are no other factories in our block. Many women travel to the nothern end of the town to the knitwear and the kiltmaker factories.Both men and women work in shops,cafes,hotels,offices and banks.Men are employed in garages, building firms and other allied trades and some are employed by the council.A few men also work in the knitwear and sheepskin factories .Some farmers in the district also employ a few men.Many have to travel out of the town to find work. It was reported in the local paper recently that 9% of the people are unemployed.
